text: Orkel AS is a Norwegian company that produces agricultural machinery. Orkel is located in Orkland, in close vicinity to Trondheim. The company was established in 1949 by Johan Gjønnes. It is one of the largest industrial companies in the county of Sør-Trøndelag. Orkel is, together with Kverneland Group among the largest producers of agricultural machinery in Norway. The main product in the international market is the Compactor. Orkel exports the compactor to more than 40 countries. The company is one of the biggest manufacturers in its segment in NorwayNorwegian agri-tech goes global | Gemini.no ==References== ==External links== * Orkel' homepage (corporate web site) Category:Manufacturing companies established in 1945 Category:Agricultural machinery manufacturers of Norway Category:Companies based in Trøndelag Category:1945 establishments in Norway Category:Orkland
title: Orkel
